macro.name: BAUD
macro.description: Serial communication baud rate, defaults to 9600.

macro.name: BITS
macro.description: Serial communication number of bits, defaults to 8.

macro.name: PARITY
macro.description: Serial communication parity, defaults to none.

macro.name: STOP
macro.description: Serial communication stop bit, defaults to 1.

macro.name: HE3POT_HIGHT_ISOBUS
macro.description: ISOBUS Address of the ITC503 used to control the Helium-3 Pot at high temperatures.

macro.name: HE3POT_LOWT_ISOBUS
macro.description: ISOBUS Address of the ITC503 used to control the Helium-3 Pot at low temperatures.

macro.name: 1KPOT_ISOBUS
macro.description: ISOBUS Address of the ITC503 used to control the 1K Pot.

macro.name: SORB_ISOBUS
macro.description: ISOBUS Address of the ITC503 used to control the Sorb.
